channel.title: Drop item on death
channel.description:
well iv been fooling around some time now(like 3 hours)
but iam still in the same stage
the problem: if some1 dies on server(508)
it keeps all item and get random drops(PVP)
it becomes a ghost and i have to do ::revive to become alive again(mezzyscape sourch)
i really would love u if u can give me a guide or make me a sollution for this problem
so i can make player drop all item(exept 3 normal 4 prayer) and skull everything) and get rid of the random drops and the ghost thing and ::revive dont think u need to solve all in ones if u can solve 1 problem iam happy already
thanks:)

item.title: Drop item on death
item.dc:creator: @neobug134 neobug134
item.description:
@neobug134 wrote:

usman ill try it now i will let u know if it worked:)

okey death place fixed now ill try the commands
okey the commands is gone to thanks alot:)

now i only need some1 who can help me with the drops

so i want if u die (pvp or pve) just drop all with skull keep 0 without keep 3 items

hope some1 can help me with last problem to thanks:)

Read full topic

item.title: Drop item on death
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

delete the code that brings you to the death place
when your in the death place do ::mypos and find your coordinates
search those coordinates and delet the code
and delete ::revive by searching (“revive”)

Read full topic
